job.command:
starver SL14i
cons
set minVr = -999 set maxVr = -999 set minVz = -999 set maxVz = -999 set minVx = -999 set maxVx = -999 set minVy = -999 set maxVy = -999 set beamSpotX = -999 set beamSpotY = -999 set minPrimaryTracks = -999 set maxVertices = -999
set nEvents = 999999 root4star -q -b RunStDataCollectorMaker.C\($nEvents,\"$FILELIST\",\"$SCRATCH/\",\"$JOBID\",$minVr,$maxVr,$minVz,$maxVz,$minVx,$maxVx,$minVy,$maxVy,$beamSpotX,$beamSpotY,$minPrimaryTracks,$maxVertices\)
